K

kill() - Method in interface contract.IMobile
Destroys the element, by removing it from the map, unregistering it from the dynamic elements list, and if the main character, loading the menu.

T

tick() - Method in interface contract.IModel
Executes a game tick, loading a new map if needed, cycling through the AIs and the player's action routines, and removing those that need to be.
